泏泏泏

泏字的基本解释

泏
chù
〔泏泏〕（水）流出的样子，如“原流泏泏，冲而不盈。”

泏
shè
古通“涉”，历，入。

泏字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhú］
［《廣韻》竹律切，入術，知。］
水流出貌。
[②]［shè］
同“涉1”。
(1)入，进入。
(2)行，行走。

泏字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　泏； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页616第03
【唐韻】【集韻】?竹律切，音絀。【說文】水貌。一曰水出貌。【文子·通原篇】原流泏泏，沖而不盈。　又【集韻】敕律切，音黜。義同。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?苦骨切，音窟。【字林】水定也。一曰漚池。　又與涉同。【班固·十八侯銘】身泏項營，序功差德。

泏字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
泏字的起名意思

暂无。

Widow
Basic explanation of words
Widow
chù
〔泏泏] The way (water) flows out, such as "the original flow is swollen, flushing but not profitable."
Widow
shè
Gu Tong "was", calendar, enter.
Widow
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhú］
["Guangyun" bamboo rhythm cut, enter the technique, know. ]
Water flows out.
[②]［shè］
Same as "Wait 1".
(1) Enter, enter.
(2) Go, walk.
Widow
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　泏; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 616 03
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Bamboo rhythm cut, sound dwarf. [Said the text] Water appearance. One said that the water appeared. [Wenzi·Tongyuan Chapter] The original flow is lush, rushing but not profitable.　[Jiyun] Diliqi cut, the sound is off. The same meaning.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Bitter bone cut, sound cave. [Word Lin] Shui Ding also. One said the pond.　The same with Shelter. 【Ban Gu·Eighteen Hou Ming】Shenzhen Xiangying, orderly meritorious.
Widow
